titles: Elegie on the much to be lamented death of the Right Honourable, Alexander Lord Reath, one of his Majesties most honourable Privy Council, and Exchequer, &c. Departed this life, March 21 1698.
author: Donaldson, James, fl. 1697-1713.
notes: Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
keywords: Melville, Alexander Melville, --  Lord Raith, d. 1698 --  Death and burial --  Poetry.
